casebody.data:
176 A.3d 222 IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION (HOFFMANN-LA ROCHE INC. AND ROCHE LABORATORIES INC.-PETITIONERS)

C-389 September Term 2017

079933 December 8, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4760-14 and A-164-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
